mean_cn: n.怀孕；构想，设想；思想，观念
mean_en: the process of forming an idea or a plan; an understanding or a belief of what something is or what something should be; the process of an egg being fertilized inside a woman’s body so that she becomes pregnant
sentence: This baby will come into the world nine months after conception.
sentence_trans: 怀孕九个月后，宝宝会来到这个世上。
word_etyma: con共同 + cept拿，抓，握住 + ion名词后缀 → conception概念，观念
